00277 
00278       // Array that holds all available group objects.
00279       DArray< Group<N> >     groups_;
00280 
00281       // Set of pointers to local groups.
00282       ArraySet< Group<N> >   groupSet_;
00283 
00284       // Stack of pointers to unused local Group objects.
00285       ArrayStack< Group<N> > reservoir_;
00286 
00287       // Array of pointers to groups, indexed by Id.
00288       // Elements corresponding to absent groups hold null pointers.
00289       DArray< Group<N>* >    groupPtrs_;
00290 
00291       // Pointer to space for a new local Group
00292       Group<N>* newPtr_;
00293 
00294       // Capacity for local groups on this processor.
00295       int capacity_;
00296 
00297       // Maximum number of groups on all processors, maximum id + 1
00298       int totalCapacity_;
00299 
00300       // Total number of distinct groups on all processors.
00301       int nTotal_;
00302

00307       Setable<int>  maxNGroup_;

00358    * Read parameters and allocate memory.
00359    */
00360    template <int N>
00361    void GroupStorage<N>::readParam(std::istream& in)
00362    {
00363       read<int>(in, "capacity", capacity_);
00364       read<int>(in, "totalCapacity", totalCapacity_);
00365       allocate();
00366    }

00368    /*
00369    * Set parameters and allocate memory.
00370    */
00371    template <int N>
00372    void GroupStorage<N>::initialize(int capacity, int totalCapacity)
00373    {
00374       capacity_      = capacity;
00375       totalCapacity_ = totalCapacity;
00376       allocate();
00377    }
00378 
00379    /*
00380    * Allocate and initialize all containers (private).
00381    */
00382    template <int N>
00383    void GroupStorage<N>::allocate()
00384    {
00385       groups_.allocate(capacity_);
00386       reservoir_.allocate(capacity_);
00387       groupSet_.allocate(groups_);
00388       groupPtrs_.allocate(totalCapacity_);
00389 
00390       // Push all groups onto reservoir stack, in reverse order.
00391       for (int i = capacity_ - 1; i >=0; --i) {
00392           reservoir_.push(groups_[i]);
00393       }
00394 
00395       // Nullify all pointers in groupPtrs_ array.
00396       for (int i = 0; i < totalCapacity_; ++i) {
00397          groupPtrs_[i] = 0;
00398       }
00399 
00400    }
00401 
00402    // Local group mutators
00403 
00404    /*
00405    * Returns address for a new local Group.
00406    */ 
00407    template <int N>
00408    Group<N>* GroupStorage<N>::newPtr()
00409    {
00410       // Precondition
00411       if (newPtr_ != 0) 
00412          UTIL_THROW("Unregistered newPtr_ still active");
00413       newPtr_ = &reservoir_.pop();
00414       newPtr_->clear();
00415       return newPtr_;
00416    }
00417 
00418    /*
00419    * Pushes unused pointer back onto reservoir.
00420    */ 
00421    template <int N>
00422    void GroupStorage<N>::returnPtr()
00423    {
00424       // Preconditions
00425       if (newPtr_ == 0) 
00426          UTIL_THROW("No active newPtr_");
00427       newPtr_->setId(-1);
00428       reservoir_.push(*newPtr_);
00429       newPtr_ = 0;
00430    }
00431 
00432    /*
00433    * Register new local Group in internal data structures.
00434    */ 
00435    template <int N>
00436    Group<N>* GroupStorage<N>::add()
00437    {
00438 
00439       // Preconditions
00440       if (newPtr_ == 0) {
00441          UTIL_THROW("No active newPtr_");
00442       }
00443       int groupId = newPtr_->id();
00444       if (groupId < 0 || groupId >= totalCapacity_) {
00445          std::cout << "groupId = " << groupId << std::endl;
00446          UTIL_THROW("Invalid group id");
00447       }
00448       if (groupPtrs_[groupId] != 0) {
00449          UTIL_THROW("Group with specified id is already present");
00450       }
00451 
00452       // Add Group<N> object to container
00453       groupSet_.append(*newPtr_);
00454       groupPtrs_[groupId] = newPtr_;
00455 
00456       // Release newPtr_ for reuse.
00457       Group<N>* ptr = newPtr_;
00458       newPtr_ = 0;
00459 
00460       // Check maximum.
00461       if (groupSet_.size() > maxNGroupLocal_) {
00462          maxNGroupLocal_ = groupSet_.size();
00463       }
00464 
00465       return ptr;
00466    }
00467 
00468    /*
00469    * Add a new Group with a specified id, return pointer to new Group.
00470    */
00471    template <int N>
00472    Group<N>* GroupStorage<N>::add(int id)
00473    {
00474       Group<N>* ptr = newPtr();
00475       ptr->setId(id);
00476       add();
00477       return ptr;
00478    }
00479 
00480    /*
00481    * Remove a specific local Group.
00482    */
00483    template <int N>
00484    void GroupStorage<N>::remove(Group<N>* groupPtr)
00485    {
00486       int groupId = groupPtr->id();
00487       if (groupId < 0 || groupId >= totalCapacity_) {
00488          std::cout << "Group id = " << groupId << std::endl;
00489          UTIL_THROW("Invalid group id, out of range");
00490       } else if (groupPtrs_[groupId] == 0) {
00491          UTIL_THROW("Group does not exist on this processor");
00492       }
00493       reservoir_.push(*groupPtr);
00494       groupSet_.remove(*groupPtr);
00495       groupPtrs_[groupId] = 0;
00496       groupPtr->setId(-1);
00497    }
00498

00502    * Return pointer to Group with specified id.
00503    */
00504    template <int N>
00505    Group<N>* GroupStorage<N>::find(int id) const
00506    {  return groupPtrs_[id]; }

00511    template <int N>
00512    void GroupStorage<N>::begin(GroupIterator<N>& iterator)
00513    {  groupSet_.begin(iterator); }

00516    * Set const iterator to beginning of the set of local groups.

00518    template <int N>
00519    void GroupStorage<N>::begin(ConstGroupIterator<N>& iterator) const
00520    {  groupSet_.begin(iterator); }

00522    /*
00523    * Check validity of this GroupStorage.
00524    *
00525    * Returns true if all is ok, or throws an Exception.
00526    */
00527    template <int N>
00528    bool GroupStorage<N>::isValid()
00529    {
00530       
00531       if (size() + reservoir_.size() != capacity_) 
00532          UTIL_THROW("nGroup + reservoir size != local capacity"); 
00533 
00534       Group<N>* ptr;
00535       int       i, j;
00536       j = 0;
00537       for (i = 0; i < totalCapacity_ ; ++i) {
00538          ptr = groupPtrs_[i];
00539          if (ptr != 0) {
00540             ++j;
00541             if (ptr->id() != i) {
00542                UTIL_THROW("ptr->id() != i"); 
00543             }
00544          }
00545       }
00546 
00547       // Count local groups
00548       GroupIterator<N> iter;
00549       j = 0;
00550       for (begin(iter); iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00551          ++j;
00552          ptr = find(iter->id());
00553          if (ptr == 0)
00554             UTIL_THROW("Unable to find local group returned by iterator"); 
00555          if (ptr != iter.get())
00556             UTIL_THROW("Inconsistent find(iter->id()"); 
00557       }
00558       if (j != size())
00559          UTIL_THROW("Number from iterator != size()"); 
00560 
00561       return true;
00562    }
00563 
00567    template <int N>
00568    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00569    void GroupStorage<N>::computeNTotal(MPI::Intracomm& communicator)
00570    #else
00571    void GroupStorage<N>::computeNTotal()
00572    #endif
00573    {
00574       GroupIterator<N> iterator;
00575       Atom* atomPtr;
00576       int nLocal = 0;
00577       begin(iterator);
00578       for ( ; iterator.notEnd(); ++iterator) {
00579          atomPtr = iterator->atomPtr(0);
00580          if (atomPtr) {
00581             if (!atomPtr->isGhost()) {
00582                ++nLocal;
00583             }
00584          }
00585       }
00586       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00587       communicator.Reduce(&nLocal, &nTotal_, 1, 
00588                           MPI::INT, MPI::SUM, 0);
00589       if (communicator.Get_rank() !=0) {
00590          nTotal_ = -1;
00591       }
00592       #else
00593       nTotal_ = nLocal;
00594       #endif
00595    }
00596 
00597    /*
00598    * Compute memory usage statistics (call on all processors).
00599    */
00600    template <int N>
00601    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00602    void GroupStorage<N>::computeStatistics(MPI::Intracomm& communicator)
00603    #else
00604    void GroupStorage<N>::computeStatistics()
00605    #endif
00606    { 
00607       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00608       int maxNGroupGlobal;
00609       communicator.Allreduce(&maxNGroupLocal_, &maxNGroupGlobal, 1, 
00610                              MPI::INT, MPI::MAX);
00611       maxNGroup_.set(maxNGroupGlobal);
00612       maxNGroupLocal_ = maxNGroupGlobal;
00613       #else
00614       maxNGroup_.set(maxNGroupLocal_);
00615       #endif
00616    }
00617 
00618    /*
00619    * Clear all statistics.
00620    */
00621    template <int N>
00622    void GroupStorage<N>::clearStatistics() 
00623    {
00624       maxNGroupLocal_ = 0;
00625       maxNGroup_.unset();
00626    }
00627 
00628    /*
00629    * Output statistics.
00630    */
00631    template <int N>
00632    void GroupStorage<N>::outputStatistics(std::ostream& out)
00633    {
00634 
00635       out << std::endl;
00636       out << "GroupStorage<" << N << ">" << std::endl;
00637       out << "NGroup: max, capacity    " 
00638                   << Int(maxNGroup_.value(), 10)
00639                   << Int(capacity_, 10)
00640                   << std::endl;
00641    }
00642 
00643    /*
00644    * Check validity of all groups on this processor.
00645    */
00646    template <int N>
00647    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00648    bool GroupStorage<N>::isValid(AtomStorage& atomStorage, MPI::Intracomm& communicator,
00649                                  bool hasGhosts)
00650    #else
00651    bool GroupStorage<N>::isValid(AtomStorage& atomStorage, bool hasGhosts)
00652    #endif
00653    {
00654       int i;
00655       int atomId;
00656       int nAtom;  // Number of local atoms in particular group.
00657       int nGhost; // Number of local atoms in particular group.
00658       int nAtomGroup = 0; // Number of local atoms in all groups on processor
00659       Atom* atomPtr;
00660       ConstGroupIterator<N> groupIter;
00661 
00662       // Call simpler function that only checks storage data structures.
00663       isValid();
00664 
00665       // Loop over groups.
00666       begin(groupIter);
00667       for ( ; groupIter.notEnd(); ++groupIter) {
00668          nAtom = 0;
00669          nGhost = 0;
00670          for (i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
00671             atomId  = groupIter->atomId(i);
00672             if (atomId < 0 || atomId >= atomStorage.totalAtomCapacity()) {
00673                UTIL_THROW("Invalid atom id in Group");
00674             }
00675             atomPtr = groupIter->atomPtr(i);
00676             if (atomPtr) {
00677                if (atomPtr != atomStorage.find(atomId)) {
00678                   UTIL_THROW("Inconsistent non-null atom pointer in Group");
00679                }
00680                if (atomPtr->isGhost()) {
00681                   ++nGhost;
00682                } else {
00683                   ++nAtom;
00684                }
00685             } else {
00686                atomPtr = atomStorage.find(atomId);
00687                if (atomPtr != 0) {
00688                   if (atomPtr->isGhost()) {
00689                      if (hasGhosts) {
00690                           UTIL_THROW("Missing ghost atom");
00691                      }
00692                   } else {
00693                      UTIL_THROW("Missing local atom");
00694                   }
00695                }
00696             }
00697          }
00698          if (nAtom == 0) {
00699             UTIL_THROW("Empty group");
00700          }
00701          if (hasGhosts && (nAtom + nGhost) < N) {
00702             UTIL_THROW("Incomplete group");
00703          }
00704          nAtomGroup += nAtom;
00705       }
00706 
00707       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00708       // Count & return number of local atoms in groups on all processors.
00709       int nAtomGroupTotal;
00710       const int source = 0;
00711       communicator.Reduce(&nAtomGroup, &nAtomGroupTotal, 1, 
00712                           MPI::INT, MPI::SUM, source);
00713       if (communicator.Get_rank() == source) {
00714          if (nTotal_ < 0) {
00715             UTIL_THROW("nTotal not set before isValid");
00716          }
00717          if (nAtomGroupTotal != nTotal_*N) {
00718             std::cout << "nAtomGroupTotal = " << nAtomGroupTotal << std::endl;
00719             std::cout << "nTotal*N        = " << nTotal_*N  << std::endl;
00720             UTIL_THROW("Discrepancy in number of local atoms in Group objects");
00721          }
00722       }
00723       #endif
00724 
00725       return true;
00726    }
00727 }
00728 #endif
